history.proof: intros tr1 tr2 H. unfold sequential_trace in H. intros k s ms s' ms' H1 H2. qauto depth: 4 l: on use: @stream_app_spec1' unfold: partial_stream_len, trace.

ctx: intros k s ms s' ms' H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: specialize (H k s ms s' ms').
exceptions.exn: In environment state : Type tr1, tr2 : trace state k : nat s : state ms : MetaState state H : forall (s' : state) (ms' : MetaState state), stream_app tr1 tr2 (k + 1) = Some (s, ms) -> stream_app tr1 tr2 (S (k + 1)) = Some (s', ms') -> ms = Terminating s' s' : state ms' : MetaState state H1 : tr1 k = Some (s, ms) H2 : tr1 (S k) = Some (s', ms') The term "k" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "state".

original: intros tr1 tr2 H. unfold sequential_trace in H. intros k s ms s' ms' H1 H2. specialize (H (k + 1) s ms). specialize (H k s ms s' ms'). rewrite stream_app_def in H. apply H. - rewrite stream_app_def. rewrite H1. reflexivity. - rewrite stream_app_def. rewrite H2. reflexivity.
